code: import{ACCOUNT_GROUP_FAIL,ACCOUNT_GROUP_REQUEST,ACCOUNT_GROUP_SUCCESS,ADD_ACCOUNT_FAIL,ADD_ACCOUNT_REQUEST,ADD_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS}from"../constants/accountConstants";export var account_groupReducer=function account_groupReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ACCOUNT_GROUP_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ACCOUNT_GROUP_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,account_groupInfo:action.payload};case ACCOUNT_GROUP_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};export var addAccountReducer=function addAccountReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ADD_ACCOUNT_REQUEST:return{loading:true};case ADD_ACCOUNT_SUCCESS:return{loading:false,accountAdd:action.payload};case ADD_ACCOUNT_FAIL:return{loading:false,error:action.payload};default:return state;}};
